home.title: Welcome to CASP Education
home.subtitle: We offer the best educational resources for Arabic
home.heroTitle: The Arab Center for Educational Services in Canada
home.heroDescription: Discover a wide range of books, lessons, and educational resources specially designed for learning Arabic
home.aboutDescription: We are dedicated to providing the best educational resources for Arabic learning, combining modern pedagogical methods with engaging content.
home.aboutPoint2: Interactive tools and modern learning technologies
home.aboutPoint3: Educational experts specializing in Arabic language
home.noProducts: No products found in this category.
home.partnersSubtitle: We are proud to partner with leading educational institutions around the globe
home.publicationsSubtitle: We offer distinguished educational collections carefully designed to meet the needs of learners at various stages.
home.videoSubtitle: A quick look at our mission, programs, and our impact on Arabic language education.

darManabe.name: Dar Manabe Alnour
darManabe.address: Fevzipaşa Cad. Fatih PTT Merkezi No:11 Kat: 9/3, 34080 Fatih – Istanbul

darAlKutub.name: Dar Al-Kutub
darAlKutub.address: Kreuzgasse 8, 3294 Büren an der Aare, Switzerland

arabicSeries.title: Arabic Series Curricula
arabicSeries.description: Integrated educational curricula covering all learner needs, from foundation to mastery, according to the latest educational standards.
arabicSeries.pedagogyDesc: Curricula based on the latest active learning theories.
arabicSeries.cultureDesc: Connecting language to its identity and history.
arabicSeries.digitalDesc: Interactive platforms and audio resources accompanying books.
arabicSeries.gardenOfArabicDesc: A fun journey for kids and beginners.
arabicSeries.alWafiDesc: The comprehensive reference for Arabic students. Complete coverage of grammar, morphology, and rhetoric in a modern, simplified style.
arabicSeries.grammarDesc: Detailed and accessible explanation of all grammar rules.
arabicSeries.audioDesc: Listening texts recorded by elite broadcasters.
arabicSeries.exercisesDesc: Thousands of questions and exercises to reinforce learning.
arabicSeries.wafiVol1Desc: Introduction to nominal/verbal sentences and core vocabulary.
arabicSeries.wafiVol2Desc: In-depth study of grammatical modifiers and object types.
arabicSeries.wafiVol3Desc: Understanding Arabic word structure and derivation.
arabicSeries.wafiVol4Desc: Study of eloquence and literary appreciation.
arabicSeries.alMufidDesc: Your practical companion for mastering Arabic. A series focused on the functional use of language in daily life and study.
arabicSeries.usageDesc: We skip the theory and focus on how to use the language directly.
arabicSeries.referenceDesc: Summaries and tables to find information in seconds.
arabicSeries.vocabDesc: Terms that keep up with modern times, technology, and media.
arabicSeries.mufidVol1Desc: Selected texts to develop rapid comprehension skills.
arabicSeries.mufidVol2Desc: Spelling rules, punctuation, and functional writing arts.
arabicSeries.mufidVol3Desc: Dialogues and scenarios to develop verbal fluency.

islamicSeries.title: Islamic Education Series
islamicSeries.description: An integrated educational system combining authentic Islamic values with modern pedagogical methods to build a generation proud of its faith.
islamicSeries.sourceDesc: Reliable content derived from Quran and Sahih Sunnah.
islamicSeries.spiritualDesc: Instilling love for God and His Prophet in young hearts.
islamicSeries.alTareeqAlMuneerArabicDesc: Graduated methodology for literacy and reading.
islamicSeries.theHappyMuslimDesc: Building positive values and joy in the child's heart.
islamicSeries.hidayahDesc: Comprehensive Islamic studies: Creed, Fiqh, and Sirah.

hidayah.title: Hidayah Curriculum
hidayah.description: An integrated Islamic educational series aimed at building a balanced personality and instilling noble values in young minds with a modern approach.
hidayah.aqidahDesc: Instilling faith in God and understanding the pillars of Islam rationally and spiritually.
hidayah.fiqhDesc: Simplified practical teaching of prayer and daily worship linked to life.
hidayah.akhlaqDesc: Reinforcing moral values like honesty, integrity, and kindness to parents.
hidayah.journeyDesc: The curriculum is divided into graduated stages suiting the student's mental and spiritual growth.
hidayah.level1Desc: Foundation Stage: Simple stories, nasheeds, and basic principles.
hidayah.level2Desc: Building Stage: Understanding worship meanings and memorizing short Surahs.
hidayah.level3Desc: Understanding Stage: Studying the Prophet's ﷺ biography and applying ethics.
hidayah.level4Desc: Application Stage: Awareness of contemporary issues and leadership building.

tareeqAlMuneerAr.title: Tareeq Al Muneer
tareeqAlMuneerAr.description: A specialized methodology for Arabic literacy, guiding students from the basics to the light of fluency.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.phoneticDesc: Precise focus on letter articulation points.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.visualDesc: Designed for visual comfort and letter distinction.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.gradualDesc: Smooth transition from letters to words to sentences.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.milestonesDesc: Four key stations ensuring a solid foundation.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.level1Desc: Recognizing Arabic letters, their forms, and names.
tareeqAlMuneerAr.level2Desc: Mastering short vowels and long vowels (Madood).
tareeqAlMuneerAr.level4Desc: Reading simple sentences and texts with speed.

tareeqAlMuneerFr.title: Tareeq Al Muneer (French Edition)
tareeqAlMuneerFr.description: A curriculum specially designed for French-speaking students, combining Arabic grammatical precision with French pedagogical clarity.
tareeqAlMuneerFr.bilingualDesc: Grammar and vocabulary explained in French for easier understanding.
tareeqAlMuneerFr.phoneticDesc: Linking Arabic sounds to their French counterparts where applicable.
tareeqAlMuneerFr.culturalDesc: Texts that respect the cultural background of Western students.
tareeqAlMuneerFr.pathDesc: Four levels taking the student from alphabet to fluency.

theHappyMuslim.title: The Happy Muslim
theHappyMuslim.description: A fun educational series aiming to build the Muslim child's personality by instilling values of happiness, optimism, and love for good.
theHappyMuslim.joyfulDesc: We use play and fun stories to make learning a happy experience.
theHappyMuslim.valuesDesc: Linking Islamic values to daily life and practical behavior.
theHappyMuslim.creativeDesc: Artistic activities and nasheeds that develop taste and aesthetics.
theHappyMuslim.seriesDesc: Five levels covering different aspects of a Muslim child's life.
theHappyMuslim.book1Desc: Introducing the child to their Lord and religion in a lovable way.
theHappyMuslim.book2Desc: Teaching etiquette of eating, sleeping, and interacting with others.
theHappyMuslim.book3Desc: Selected stories from the Prophet's ﷺ life highlighting his mercy.
theHappyMuslim.book4Desc: Reflecting on God's creations and protecting the environment.
theHappyMuslim.book5Desc: Actions of the heart like honesty, love, and reliance on God.

adultEducation.title: Adult Education & Career Paths
adultEducation.description: Advanced methodology designed for professionals. Choose the path that serves your career and personal goals, whether for business, media, or travel.
adultEducation.pathDescription: Instead of general lessons, we offer specialized tracks focusing on the vocabulary and skills you actually need in your field.
adultEducation.businessDesc: Master the language of meetings, formal correspondence, and negotiation.
adultEducation.mediaDesc: Understand news language, political analysis, and modern media terminology.
adultEducation.travelDesc: Gain confidence to speak in airports and hotels, and explore Arab culture.
adultEducation.microLearningDesc: Short, focused lessons that fit your busy schedule.
adultEducation.speakingFocusDesc: Practical exercises to break the fear of speaking.
adultEducation.nativeContextDesc: Content derived from real daily Arab life.
adultEducation.corporateDesc: We offer custom solutions for companies to boost employee communication skills.

gardenOfArabic.title: Garden of Arabic
gardenOfArabic.description: A comprehensive educational series taking students on a journey of growth, from planting the seeds of letters to harvesting the fruits of fluency.
gardenOfArabic.stagesDesc: A graduated methodology ensuring a solid foundation and natural skill development.
gardenOfArabic.level1Desc: Establishing correct pronunciation and writing of Arabic letters in their various forms.
gardenOfArabic.level2Desc: Enriching vocabulary with words from the student's daily environment with illustrations.
gardenOfArabic.level3Desc: Moving from words to meaningful sentences, understanding basic grammar simply.
gardenOfArabic.level4Desc: Reading texts and short stories, developing written and oral expression skills.
gardenOfArabic.feature1: Interactive audio stories that engage the child.

teacherGuide.title: Teacher's Guide Hub
teacherGuide.description: Comprehensive educational resource platform. We provide educators with lesson plans, solutions, and pedagogical guidelines.
teacherGuide.gardenDesc: Plans for teaching letters and basic skills to children.
teacherGuide.wafiDesc: Detailed methodology for teaching grammar and morphology.
teacherGuide.mufidDesc: Practical guidelines for functional reading and writing lessons.

gardenGuide.title: Garden of Arabic Teacher's Guide
gardenGuide.description: Contains motivation techniques, suggested stories, and extra worksheets.

wafiGuide.title: Al Wafi Teacher's Guide
wafiGuide.description: Academic reference for teachers, including exercise answers and extra grammar notes.

mufidGuide.title: Al Mufid Teacher's Guide
mufidGuide.description: Training kit for teachers to deliver interactive language skills lessons.

happyMuslimGuide.title: Teacher's Guide: Happy Muslim
happyMuslimGuide.description: Pedagogical guidelines for instilling values and creating fun classroom activities.

lessonsTests.title: Tests & Assessments
lessonsTests.description: A collection of tests to evaluate student progress in grammar, vocabulary, and comprehension.

handwritingExercises.title: Handwriting Exercises
handwritingExercises.description: Worksheets designed to improve handwriting and teach correct letter formation.

letterColoring.title: Letter Coloring
letterColoring.description: Fun artistic activities combining learning with play and colors.

placementTest.title: Placement Test
placementTest.description: Don't know where to start? This smart test assesses your language skills and places you at the exact level for your abilities.
placementTest.readyDesc: Ensure you are in a quiet place. You will get your result and curriculum recommendation immediately after finishing.
placementTest.step1Desc: Do not use external help to ensure an accurate result.
placementTest.step2Desc: Questions adapt to your answer level during the test.
placementTest.step3Desc: Get a detailed report of your strengths and weaknesses.

educationalCDs.title: Digital Educational Media
educationalCDs.description: A premium collection of interactive software and audio files that work offline, enhancing the learning experience at home and school.
educationalCDs.offlineDesc: Learn anytime, anywhere without connection limits.
educationalCDs.interactiveDesc: Educational games and exercises that engage the student.
educationalCDs.audioDesc: Professional studio recordings for correct pronunciation.
educationalCDs.gardenCdDesc: The digital interactive version of the Garden series, featuring 50 educational games.
educationalCDs.wafiCdDesc: Complete audio library for listening texts in the Al-Wafi series.
educationalCDs.happyCdDesc: Animated stories and value-building games for kids.
educationalCDs.tareeqCdDesc: Pronunciation of letters and words using the repetition method.

hub.title: Digital Platforms Hub
hub.description: An integrated ecosystem of educational tools. One account unlocks limitless possibilities for learning, creating, and reading.
hub.unifiedDesc: Use the same credentials to access Al-Wafi, QalamNet, and MyBook.
hub.wafiDesc: A complete Virtual Learning Environment (LMS) for classes and assessment.
hub.qalamDesc: A space for writers and creators to publish work and interact.
hub.mybookDesc: Advanced e-reader with audio features and smart annotations.

wafi.title: Wafi Educational Platform
wafi.description: Your integrated digital campus. Manage lessons, track progress, and connect with teachers in a structured academic environment.
wafi.loginDesc: Enter your credentials to access the dashboard

qalamnet.title: QalamNet Network
qalamnet.description: The interactive writing studio. A space to create, share, and receive expert guidance.
qalamnet.communityDesc: Choose your portal to enter the world of creativity.

mybook.title: MyBook Platform
mybook.description: Your smart library everywhere. An interactive reading experience combining text, audio, and notes.
mybook.audioDesc: Listen to text with correct pronunciation.
mybook.notesDesc: Jot down thoughts directly on pages.
mybook.deviceDesc: Pick up exactly where you left off.

services.title: Our Educational Services
services.description: Integrated solutions for institutions and individuals to elevate Arabic education.
services.curriculumDesc: Building content according to modern standards.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.motivationalQuote: Education is the passport to the future.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.subtitle: Analysis of your performance and acquired skills
progress.feedbackText: Your performance is improving, especially in listening. Focus a bit on writing next week.

legal.privacyContent: At CASP Education, we prioritize your privacy. We collect only the data necessary to provide our educational services at the best possible quality.
legal.termsContent: By using our website and platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions that ensure a safe and beneficial educational experience for everyone.

footer.description: Your trusted educational partner for excellence in Arabic learning

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.thanks: Thank you for contacting us! We will get back to you soon.

auth.signUpSubtitle: Join our platform and start your Arabic learning journey today

store.title: Educational Store
store.description: Your premier destination for trusted educational resources. Books, software, and tools for a joyful learning journey.
store.printedDesc1: Educational series and stories with premium print quality delivered to your door.
store.ebooksDesc: A massive library in your pocket. Download and read instantly on any device.
store.cdsDesc: Interactive software and audio that works offline.
store.merchDesc: Stationery, flashcards, and motivational gifts for students.
store.bundleDesc: Get 20% off when you buy the full series + school bag.

ebooks.title: Digital Library
ebooks.description: Browse the latest digital releases. Available in PDF and ePub.

printedBooks.description: Browse our collection of premium paperback and hardcover books.
